message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for me. I'm feeling generous, so how about a 55/45 split in my favor? This deal benefits us both before inflation eats away at the value.
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go. Inflation is hurting me more than you!
Alice, let's be realistic. Inflation is hitting you hard, and we both lose if this drags on. I'm offering you 480,000 - take it before it shrinks even further!
